definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: Lower concentration of CCC can promote the tillering, increase underground biomass and improve the turf uniformity.
sentences.chinese: 低濃度矮壯素能促進分櫱和地下生物量的積累。

sentences.english: Effect of gibberellin and chlorocholine chloride on taxanes production was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了矮壯素和赤黴素對細胞培養生產紫杉烷的影響。
